name: Dustin Ellison
text: A bit pricey but decent service and pizza. The hand tossed dough is made fresh daily and the sauce has a nice hearty taste to it. One of the better restraunts in town. They now serve some pretty hefty salads too.

text: The best! Now, if they would just deliver to Osceola. It's only A few miles away... What? Maybe 40 miles? Who's counting.

name: Mentalhaze
text: Very good pizza with fresh toppings for a relatively low price. Get it delivered or save some change and pick it up yourself. Fast and friendly service.

name: Chris Bornemeier
text: Pizza was pretty good, really enjoyed the variety of pizza beyond the generic, such as taco pizza. Only complaint is that the pizza is a tad pricey compared to your competitors.

name: Helen Lovelace
text: Great pizza, not only that but the only pizza place that delivers to my neighborhood.  Even though I am only five minutes away from town no one else will deliver.  City limits it less than two blocks away so pizza pro it is for our family.
